content:
Art. 4.46. 
Creditors 
The creditors of a person who renounces, to the prejudice of their rights, may obtain judicial authorisation to accept the succession on behalf of their debtor, in his place.
In this case, renunciation is annulled only in favour of the creditors and only up to the amount of their claims; it is not annulled in favour of the successor who has renounced.
